long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a web content downloader. It allows you to select the content you want to record from a webpage and then download it as a packaged file.

The original intention is to use it for collecting unfamiliar words from RFCs (Request for Comments) and then download them for memorization.
